https://tmrev.io/movie/153571-Arraianos 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The inhabitants of a small village lost in the woodland between Galicia and Portugal play their own life mixed with dialogues from O bosque, a play by Galician writer Marinhas del Valle. Arraianos portrays a rural community in its obstinate resistance against disappearance. Arraianos
